description: This source file implements a platform-dependent utility function related to cryptography, specifically the creation of a cryptographic object using OpenSSL (SSLeay). It includes license and copyright information, module description, and a function to create and return a cryptography object handle.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE AnscCreateCryptoPubSSLeay(ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext)
methods.description: Creates and returns a new cryptography object handle using the function AnscCryptoPubSSLeayCreate.
